title: 137: I See Satan Fall Again, or "Lightning Does Strike Twice"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode we finish discussing man's tendency to let our mimetic rivalry escalate into scandal, leading to an eventual sacrificial scapegoat. Honestly, it all seems kinda fun to me.
itunes:author: three dudes not falling right now
itunes:subtitle: Fall once, shame on you. Fall twice, shame on Satan.
itunes:summary: In this episode we finish discussing man's tendency to let our mimetic rivalry escalate into scandal, leading to an eventual sacrificial scapegoat. Honestly, it all seems kinda fun to me.
itunes:title: 137: I See Satan Fall Again, or "Lightning Does Strike Twice"
